text: Enrique Rocha (January 5, 1940 – November 7, 2021) was a Mexican actor. He was born in Silao, Guanajuato, Mexico. His career lasted from 1963 until 2018. He played Don Bustamente in the Mexican musical sitcom Rebelde. Other roles include Satánico pandemonium, Yo compro esa mujer and El Privilegio de Amar. Rocha died on November 7, 2021 in Mexico City, aged 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:People from Guanajuato (state)
title: Enrique Rocha
